name: Cosmonator
description: Cosmonator is an 'RPG-em-up': a hybrid of classic fast-paced top-down shoot-em-up action infused with deep character building elements. Build up your own unique alien-killing machine to avenge the destruction of planet Earth!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2, 2ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB Video RAM and at least Shader Model 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
